Title: Relates to consideration of gender-affirming health care or gender-affirming mental health care in child custody cases
Summary: Relates to consideration of gender-affirming health care or gender-affirming mental health care in child custody cases for purposes of jurisdiction, forum and enforcement of custody orders.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law, in relation to consideration of gender-affirming health care or gender-affirming mental health care in child custody cases
